channel.title: Moparscape client update?
channel.description: Well this is bugging me, if people can make their own clients that have skill capes, defenders, etc. Why can't we add all this stuff to the moparscape client I mean it would attract more people and make the servers alot more exciting and maybe update the way runescape looks or add different effects to make it alot more fun. It's a susgestion please, don't spam, flame, or use cruel language.. ;)

item.title: Moparscape client update?
item.dc:creator: @hawkpunk7 hawkpunk7
item.description:
@hawkpunk7 wrote:

Probley not, don’t want people stealing their creation’s, still maybe the moparscape staff should ask them 2 to help them, or add it to the moparscape client, and release it. They would be pretty famous and alot of ppl would be very happy and siked, hyper etc. :P[br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2007, 04:11:32 AM[/size][hr]Add pest control, castle wars, and make a real fighter torso :D[br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2007, 04:38:13 AM[/size][hr]Just to let you know, i subsituted the dark bow, for a real fighter torso like they have on runescape to make that something unknown or that hasn’t been yet discused. :)[br][size=1]Posted on: August 26, 2007, 05:56:08 AM[/size][hr]Can a moparscape staff member give their opinion so I don’t loot like a complete idiot lol…

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape client update?
item.dc:creator: @Called_enzo Called enzo
item.description:
@Called_enzo wrote:

Ripvayne:

Hehehm Yeah. So, can you take a look at some of the topics I posted btw? you may be able to help me

Are u talking to me ?/

hawkpunk7:

Yeah, jagex has been around for a while. I’ve been into private server’s for about 1year and havn’t saw any updates so just thought i’d make a poll so see what people’s opinion’s are

Look darkbows are gettable… just not the real .,… like ucan make it working shoot double arrow … and u can add a spec to it…

Same skillcapes… arent the real … but u can add emote’s and a cape wich u can get when u reached a 99 stat … its just like rs . but it doesnt look like it

Defenders… are just daggers who placed in shield… … and then give them bonus…

Thats with all stuff , u can give it a look like rs… try to get it the same… but it will take u years to get 100% darkbow ore stuff

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape client update?

item.description:
@hawkpunk7 wrote:

Thanks for the vote, and I took out the dark bow, don’t wanna post something that’s already been posted…I’ve only said this because i’ve looked around and havn’t saw anything about the moparscape client update, just thought it would be good to have a real rs version or better to play, oh well thanks for the votes
